title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 September 2012 - XWiki
content:
01:14 <sburjan> has quit  
01:15 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
03:05 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
03:55 <tekzilla> has quit  
03:56 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
05:05 <eshan> has joined #xwiki  
05:14 <eshan> has left #xwiki  
06:50 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
07:06 <CIA-121> Denis Gervalle stable-3.5.x \* r7ebd2e8 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/7ebd2e84d1e80aac0b3f63e3e0d5dbf20ed65cd4 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-8130: copyDocument should not copy the custom mapping of the document xClass - http://git.io/FoJOKA  
07:06 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:41 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:56 <mflorea> has quit  
07:57 <CIA-121> Richard Hierlmeier master \* r4c31fc0 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/4c31fc02ef33f052e5c1b007cc2be9181d2f1175 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-blog/xwiki-platform-blog-ui/src/main/resources/Blog/BlogCode.xml : [misc] Fixed double encoding of & in blog pagination URLs - http://git.io/gBHnKw  
08:04 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
08:08 <polx> has quit  
08:08 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
08:09 <polx> has quit  
08:13 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:26 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <polx> has quit  
08:51 <vmassol> good morning  
08:51 <vmassol> we should really succeed in releasing today  
08:51 <vmassol> we need everyone to help and focus on the release to make it happen  
08:52 <vmassol> functional tests failing on platform becuase of a display issue  
09:03 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <polx> has quit  
09:26 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <CIA-121> tmortagne master \* r6a5fc04 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/6a5fc045dcb5d436aa0d72e10fddc8ddde5d2bde / (5 files in 4 dirs): XWIKI-8188: Extension Manager resets the hidden property to false when it installs documents - http://git.io/3a4MeQ  
09:39 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <CIA-121> Vincent Massol feature-newmodel \* rc4899f1 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/c4899f133d9a8e54a37e03719ba7404a8eba1ac3 / (4 files in 3 dirs): XWIKI-8177: Introduce new Model API and bridge to the current oldcore Model - http://git.io/4ag2Xw  
10:14 <Denis> has quit  
10:15 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <+Enygma`> tmortagne, mflorea: what is the status with the pending issues for 4.2M3? http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/IssueNavigator.jspa?reset=true&jqlQuery=Project+in+%28%22XWiki+Commons%22%2C+%22XWiki+Rendering%22%2C+%22XWiki+Platform%22%2C+%22XWiki+Enterprise%22%2C+%22XWiki+Enterprise+Manager%22%29+and+fixVersion+in+%28%224.2-milestone-3%22%29+and+resolution+in+%28%22Unresolved%22%29  
10:16 <+Enygma`> we`d like to try to release today, if possible  
10:17 <+tmortagne> \* http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8184 is not a blocker for M3  
10:18 <+tmortagne> \* http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7923 is done in a branch but waiting for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7896 before merge  
10:18 <+tmortagne> \* http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1188 go with http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8184  
10:24 <+mflorea> XWIKI-7896 needs to be documented. It's not fully done, but I'll fix/improve it for 4.2 final hopefully. Besides that, some of the functional tests need to set extensions.distribution.skipWizard=true . We didn't agree on the best place to put this code. Right now I duplicated the code in a few places but it's not nice.  
10:24 <+Enygma`> tmortagne: but http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7923 blocks http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7896, according to jira. Can`t it be merged first?  
10:25 <+tmortagne> Enygma`: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7923 is useless without http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7896, it was mostly to separate what I do and what mflorea do  
10:26 <+Enygma`> what about http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8184 ? Does it have to be split, since there is some work committed?  
10:26 <+tmortagne> mflorea: abouut extensions.distribution.skipWizard=true we should put it in the same place we disabled extensions repositories, it's the same kind of idea  
10:27 <+tmortagne> Enygma`: branch  
10:27 <+Enygma`> ah... the UI fooled me  
10:27 <+mflorea> tmortagne: there's no single place for this, we have lots of functional/integration tests  
10:27 <+Enygma`> ok, so I am postponing it for 4.2-RC1  
10:27 <+mflorea> that's why we need to decide on a commons place  
10:28 <+Enygma`> together with http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1188  
10:29 <+tmortagne> mflorea: hmm I tough there was but it's XWikiTestSetup which is only used for older setup  
10:30 <+mflorea> tests relying on selenium 1 are fine because all use the deprecated XWikiTestSetup and I put the code there, but for the rest, there is not common class where it make sense to put this code. vmassol suggested XWikiExecutor, but it's pretty generic and I don't see where to put this specific code  
10:30 <vmassol> I suggested generic in XWikiExecutor  
10:30 <vmassol> but take the info from a system property  
10:31 <vmassol> for some reason duplicating one line in pom.xml files that need this seem less an issue for me  
10:31 <vmassol> but I'm to 100% thrilled either by this  
10:31 <vmassol> note that not all tests require this, only tests not testing the upgrade process  
10:32 <vmassol> and actually I suggetsed something else  
10:32 <vmassol> I suggested to not have the need for this property at all! :)  
10:32 <vmassol> since it's not normal  
10:32 <vmassol> we shouldn't have to do upgrade when there's no upgrade  
10:32 <+mflorea> vmassol: you do need it  
10:32 <vmassol> for testing upgrades sure  
10:32 <+mflorea> no  
10:32 <+tmortagne> it's not an upgrade  
10:32 <+tmortagne> it's an install  
10:33 <vmassol> but for XAR we build ourselves  
10:33 <vmassol> we shouldn't need it  
10:33 <vmassol> and that's what we do for our functional tests  
10:33 <+mflorea> how can EM know it's a war we build ourselves?  
10:33 <vmassol> we don't have any starting with an empty wiki  
10:33 <+tmortagne> this is because of http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1188  
10:33 <vmassol> mflorea: your problem :)  
10:33 <+mflorea> s/war/xar  
10:33 <+mflorea> right  
10:34 <+tmortagne> which is what I'm working on  
10:34 <+mflorea> but we have some that don't start with the defalt UI  
10:35 <+tmortagne> mflorea: you mean the platform tests ?  
10:35 <+mflorea> yes  
10:35 <vmassol> they bring their XARs  
10:35 <vmassol> the improt them  
10:35 <+tmortagne> for those we should not have the distribution package at all  
10:35 <+tmortagne> we are not supposed to eveb right now  
10:35 <+tmortagne> so that should not be an  issue  
10:35 <vmassol> yep  
10:35 <+tmortagne> thoses are not using XE war  
10:36 <+tmortagne> they select what jar projects they need  
10:37 <+tmortagne> and if you don't have the distribution jar you should get null as script service  
10:37 <+tmortagne> so that should not do the scwitch  
10:37 <+tmortagne> switch

12:00 <CIA-121> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5.x \* r6f21515 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/6f21515fce3efe69e5cd669bdea870bf18cbb4c8 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/templates/xwikivars.vm : XWIKI-8193: Improve portlet integration - http://git.io/YqH7iw  
12:00 <CIA-121> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5.x \* r22d9d7e https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/22d9d7ec0c08d38ba53ed052d1a1afa03a1ebb8b / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/resources/js/smartclient/initsc.js : XWIKI-8193: Improve portlet integration - http://git.io/3MtsRw  
12:38 <+Enygma`> so mflorea, from what I understood, for 4.2M3, we are waiting for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7896  
12:39 <+Enygma`> do you have an ETA for it?  
12:40 <+mflorea> I have to document it, will do it after lunch. There are still some failing functional tests. I'll investigate them also after lunch.  
12:40 <+Enygma`> will we have time to try to release today?  
12:44 <+mflorea> the maven part yes  
12:45 <+mflorea> re documenting XWIKI-7896 I just need to take some screenshots and add them to the RN  
12:45 <+mflorea> fixing failing functional tests is more problematic  
12:49 <+tmortagne> mflorea: I should be able to fix http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1188 if it helps for functional tests, I'm almost done with it technically  
12:50 <+tmortagne> will finish that after lunch  
12:51 <+mflorea> tmortagne: I think for M3 it's fine to set skipWizard in enterprise tests, even if this means duplicating code. We can remove it before RC1 if you manage to fix XE-1188

16:04 <+tmortagne> thanks
